content:
We are looking for a Splunk Engineer in the UK for a Senior Integration Engineer working primarily on FHIR interfaces, but with elements of HL7v2/v3, and other NHS standards and APIs. Projects to include a huge EPR implementation in the North of England and a genuinely groudbreaking AI project in London. Answer Digital are an Employee Owned Trust offering a great benefits package. Details on: https://www.answerdigital.com/careers

You must be eligible to work in the UK in order for your application to be considered
